name: Medium Transport
Lore: 'Passenger and cargo transport built by Gallofree Yards. Enormous cargo bays can be outfitted to safely accommodate large numbers of troops, munitions or supplies.',
Text: 'May add 1 pilot, 4 passengers and 1 vehicle. Deploys and moves like a starfighter. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1.',
